mapper.insert:
select seq_cart.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_cart (cno, id, pno, qty) values (#{cno}, #{id}, #{pno}, #{qty})
mapper.delete: delete tbl_cart where id = #{id} and pno = #{pno}
mapper.select: select tbl_cart.*, tbl_product.korName, tbl_product.price, tbl_product.discount, (tbl_product.price * (100-tbl_product.discount)/100) as realPrice, (tbl_product.price * (100-tbl_product.discount)/100) * tbl_cart.qty as totalPrice from tbl_cart inner join tbl_product on tbl_cart.pno = tbl_product.pno where tbl_cart.id = #{id}
